company.renshu: Talent Digital Development Co., Ltd, Fujian

ability.p0: [Language] Certificated CET-6, won several competitions during college and is able to use English as a working language.
ability.p1: [Tech] With 2 years of experience in Vue/Nuxt web development, I am able to restore SEO friendly, corss-platform compatible, and interactive website pages based on design drafts.
ability.p2: [Tech] 2 years experience on Java & 1 year experience on .NET Core(8+) for building RESTful api services.
ability.p3: [Tech] Possess strong learning ability, willing to accept and evaluate the feasibility of new things, do not engage in empiricism or dogmatism, and practice to gain true knowledge.
ability.p4: [Tech] Understand distributed system components such as service registration and discovery, remote calling, traffic throttling, scheduled tasks, distributed locks, message queues, caching, etc.
ability.p5: [Tech] Possess basic knowledge of databases, such as transactions, rollback, table locking, row locking, query optimization, index optimization; Proficient in using common databases and ORM frameworks, such as MySQL & MyBatis & MyBatis Plus & SQLServer & SQLBugar & EFCore, etc.
ability.p6: [Tech] Possess knowledge of Docker, understand container concepts, able to write Dockerfiles and docker-compose.yaml, and have a certain understanding of Docker networks, volumes, and build parameters.

p7.seg0: [Tech] Have some understanding of cross platform mobile development, such as uniapp/flutter/mini programs.
p7.seg1: Can quickly solve usual technical problems in cross platform mobile development.

ability.p8: [Footprints of open source] participating in open source community projects with passion and providing assistance to the best of my ability, I am currently maintaining the following projects.
